Paragraph: Both the copolymers possess good solubility and thermal stability as well as low bandgap for efficient photon harvesting.

| Material Name |

| low bandgap |

Explanation:

* "copolymers" is mentioned as possessing certain properties, so it is a material name.
* "low bandgap" is also mentioned as a property of the materials, and it is a characteristic of certain materials, so it is also a material name.

* "copolymers" is the only clear material name mentioned in the paragraph.
* "low bandgap" is not a material name itself, but a property of a material. It is not a specific material, but rather a characteristic of certain materials. Therefore, it should not be included as a material name.
